import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Input from '../../components/input/index'; import Logo from '../../assets/img/logoCiti.png'; import './style.css' class Form extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { name:"", nameColor: false, lastName: "", lastNameColor: false, email: "", emailColor: false, password: "", passwordColor: false, password2:"", street: "", numExt: "", numInt: "", colony: "", CP: "", phone:"", ID: "" } } handleNameChange = (e) => { this.setState({ name: e.target.value }); if(this.state.name.length > 1){ this.setState({nameColor: true}) } } handleLastNameChange = (e) => { this.setState({ lastName: e.target.value }); if(this.state.lastName.length > 1){ this.setState({lastNameColor: true}) } } handleEmailChange = (e) => { this.setState({ email: e.target.value }); if(this.state.email.length > 1){ this.setState({emailColor: true}) } } handlePasswordChange = (e) => { this.setState({ password: e.target.value }); if(this.state.email.length > 5){ this.setState({emailColor: true}) } } render() { return (

); } } export default Form;
